entry.et: Middle English, from Old English; akin to Old High German zopf tip, tuft of hair

def.dt: :the highest point, level, or part of something :summit crown
:the head or top of the head used especially in the phrase top to toe
:the head of a plant
:the aboveground part of a plant having edible roots beet tops
:a garment worn on the upper body
:the highest or uppermost region or part
:the upper end, edge, or surface
:a fitted, integral, or attached part or unit serving as an upper piece, lid, or covering
:a platform surrounding the head of a lower mast that serves to spread the topmast rigging, strengthen the mast, and furnish a standing place for men aloft
:a comparable part of the superstructure
:such a part on a warship used as a fire-control station or antiaircraft gun platform
:the highest degree or pitch conceivable or attained :acme pinnacle
:the loudest or highest range of a sound
:the part that is nearest in space or time to the source or beginning
:the first half of an inning in baseball
:the highest position (as in rank or achievement)
:a person or thing at the top
:aces and kings in a hand or the three highest honors in a suit
:the choicest part :cream pick
:a forward spin given to a ball (as in golf or billiards) by striking it on or near the top or above the center
:the stroke so given
:a fundamental quark that has an electric charge of + 2/3 and a measured energy of approximately 175 GeV
:the flavor characterizing this particle

dro.drp: off the top of one's head

def.dt: :in an impromptu manner sat down and wrote the … story off the top of his head Jerome Beatty, Jr.
:in control of acted like a man on top of his job Newsweek
:informed about tried to keep on top of new developments
:in sudden and unexpected proximity to the deadline was on top of them
:in addition to
:in a position of eminent success, happiness, or fame
:beyond the bounds of what is expected, usual, normal, or appropriate
:to remove or cut the top of
:to shorten or remove the top of (a plant) :pinch 1b
:to cover with a top or on the top :provide, form, or serve as a top for
:to supply with a decorative or protective finish or final touch
:to resupply or refill to capacity usually used with off topped off the tank
:to complete the basic structure of (as a high-rise building) by putting on a cap or uppermost section usually used with out or off
:to bring to an end or climax usually used with off the event was topped off with a relay race Paula Rodenas
:to be or become higher than :overtop tops the previous record
:to be superior to :excel surpass
:to gain ascendancy over :dominate
:to rise to, reach, or be at the top of
:to go over the top of :clear surmount
:to strike (a ball) above the center thereby imparting topspin
:to make an end, finish, or conclusion
:to reach a summit or crest usually used with off or out
:of, relating to, or being at the top :uppermost
:chief leading one of the world's top journalists
:of the highest quality, amount, or degree top value top form
:a commonly cylindrical or conoidal device that has a tapering point on which it is made to spin and that is used especially as a toy
:place :locality topology toponymy
:topology topoisomerase
:the forty best-selling audio recordings for a given period
:constituting, playing, listing, or relating to the Top 40 Top 40 hits Top 40 stations Top 40 charts

entry.et: from a burlesque routine involving three comedians in which the one that gets the punch line also gets a banana

def.dt: :the leading comedian in a burlesque show
:kingpin 2
:prominent emphasis, featuring, or advertising
:the position at the top of a theatrical bill usually featuring the star's name
:a high boot often with light-colored leather bands around the upper part
